sub_title: Incoming PhD candidate at Queen's University, Canada | MSc student in Erasmus Mundus Language and Communication Technologies (EM-LCT) at University of Malta & University of Groningen | Speech Technologies
summary:
My research interest lies in the field of Computational Linguistics and Natural Language Processing (NLP) especially speech signal processing. 

You can visit my website for more information: www.ahnafsamin.com

projects:
[{'title': 'Automatic Speech Recognition System in Bangla Language', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'description': 'I am currently working on building an Automatic Speech Recognition system in Bangla language and also doing research in related fields. ', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Ahnaf Mozib', 'last_name': 'Samin', 'name': None, 'headline': "Incoming PhD candidate at Queen's University, Canada | MSc student in Erasmus Mundus Language and Communication Technologies (EM-LCT) at University of Malta & University of Groningen | Speech Technologies"}]}, {'title': 'Tomato Leaf Disease Detection Using Convolutional Neural Network', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'description': '‚Ä¢ Collected 4087 images of tomato leaves from Kaggle and classified into a total of seven categories including six types of diseased leaves and one healthy kind. 
‚Ä¢ Exploited Keras framework with tensorflow backend to train the model. 88.98% accuracy achieved. 
‚Ä¢ Deployed this model in web using Python-based Flask web framework.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Ahnaf Mozib', 'last_name': 'Samin', 'name': None, 'headline': "Incoming PhD candidate at Queen's University, Canada | MSc student in Erasmus Mundus Language and Communication Technologies (EM-LCT) at University of Malta & University of Groningen | Speech Technologies"}]}, {'title': 'Coin2Coin - a web app for transferring currency using Hyperledger Fabric Blockchain framework', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'description': '‚Ä¢ A web app for transferring currencies based on Hyperledger fabric - a private blockchain technology. 
‚Ä¢ Used to send and receive currency at anytime, to anyone a person wants. 
‚Ä¢ Provides security and transparency in a financial transaction in day-to-day life. Completely free of extra charge.
‚Ä¢ Used Go Lang programming language, NodeJS, HTML, CSS, Linux OS and Hyperledger Fabric framework.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Ahnaf Mozib', 'last_name': 'Samin', 'name': None, 'headline': "Incoming PhD candidate at Queen's University, Canada | MSc student in Erasmus Mundus Language and Communication Technologies (EM-LCT) at University of Malta & University of Groningen | Speech Technologies"}]}, {'title': 'Easy Meter Reading - a mobile app for automated electricity billing system', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'description': '‚Ä¢ A mobile application that automates the process of electricity bill submission. 
‚Ä¢ Description: Meter readers (generally whose job is to manually collect the readings going from house to house) can take photos of the readings from the meters using Optical Character Recognition (OCR) technology. This info is then stored on database and users/clients can get the message on their app right away. 
‚Ä¢ Enables transparency, saves time, allows users to make payment online without any paper bill required. 
‚Ä¢ Used OCR technology, android studio and firebase database.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Ahnaf Mozib', 'last_name': 'Samin', 'name': None, 'headline': "Incoming PhD candidate at Queen's University, Canada | MSc student in Erasmus Mundus Language and Communication Technologies (EM-LCT) at University of Malta & University of Groningen | Speech Technologies"}]}]
